name: Forest
reflections: The trees seem to breathe with you.
The forest hums in green silence.
A distant bird's call settles like a question.
Sunlight filters in narrow, holy shafts.
A path of soft moss invites your footsteps.

name: Ruins
reflections: Only the wind prays here now.
Stone remembers a thousand quiet footsteps.
Columns lean as if listening to memory.
A faint echo replies when you whisper.

name: Desert
description: A sea of ochre sand broken by lonely dunes, half-sunken ruins and the occasional stubborn shrub. Heat shimmers; paths are guesses and water is a rumor.
ambience: The hot wind carries grit, and distant hollows hold the hush of mirage.
reflections: The sun seems to weigh on each step.
A ripple on the horizon may be water or wishful thinking.
Sand hides tracks as soon as they are made.
Silence here bends toward the sound of your own breath.
The landscape insists you are a visitor, not a homecoming.
